column4: when you upgrade a package, do your configuration changes get clobbered?
all i want to do is upgrade libwwwperl ... and apparently i need to upgrade linux, mysql, apache2, postgre, python, sudo, grub and everything else almost, on a system.
as long as you are using official repositories for your version of ubuntu, it should be fine to upgrade and actually recommended
i am.  I decided to make this box ubuntu because it's supposed to be easy to maintain, but i'm a bsd kinda guy traditionally.
